experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.description: Fullstack engineer working on Spring applications using Java 7 and Java 8 with SQL Server 2012.

projects.description: Design, built, maintain and support Physician Dispensed In Network engine which loaded 835 EDI files with claim information that is processed through a regulatory rules and pricing engine before adjudication via web service. Created scheduled jobs to check adjudication status for post processing and integrate dataset seamlessly into the main Portal application.
Add and maintain build jobs on TeamCity.
Document deployment process for applications and process/work flow of important business functions such as State Reporting, ARM, Reindexing for Out of Network, and Bill Pay.

experience.title: Application Developer
experience.description: Distributed applications for ACH. Majority of applications were internal and built in Spring and Java 6. The applications used MSSQL 08/12 and HP SQLMX.

projects.description: Built, support, and maintain 2 Java web applications that used Spring to process transactions from batch and generate dynamic reports for users.
Support and maintain 1 Windows Server that hosted several Windows services for automated file moving/processing and 2 internal .NET applications that were self service tools for the Windows services.
Automate deployment process using firm wide repository, CI servers and shell scripts.
Communicate and collaborate with multiple teams to troubleshoot issues and derive solutions.

experience.title: Educational Technician
experience.description: Worked frontend in HTML and CSS with some jQuery or used Photoshop to create header images for class modules.

degree.name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

volunteering.title: Mentor
volunteering.description: Educating the future generation on coding using HTML, CSS and Javascript.
